title: FSIS Issues Public Health Alert for Poultry Products Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Oct. 25, 2017 The U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) is issuing a public health alert due to concerns that poultry products produced by Mary's Harvest Fresh Foods, Inc., a Portland, Ore. establishment, may be contaminated with Listeria monocytogenes. A...
impacted_products: 8.75-oz. containers with Kale & Broccoli Slaw Salad with Grilled Chicken Breast (Rib Meat) with item #20346 and a Use By dates of: 10/12/17 through 10/16/17.
